product_name: Planet Bike STX Deluxe Floor Pump
long_description: The Planet Bike STX Deluxe Floor Pump includes the anatomically designed Love Handle(TM) for a comfortable hand grip, a tall barrel so you don't have to strain and an easy-to-read gauge. Features a highly durable steel barrel, plunger and base; large padded base ensures stable pumping action. Spring at bottom of stroke ensures smooth pumping action. Improved gauge system is stronger than previous generation; includes color-coded 160 psi dial gauge. AutoValve(TM) dual head fits both Presta and Schrader valves. Needle and cone adapters included for pumping up sports balls. The Planet Bike STX Deluxe Floor Pump is rebuildable.
short_description: The Planet Bike STX Deluxe Floor Pump includes the anatomically designed Love Handle(TM) for a comfortable hand grip, a tall barrel so you don't have to strain and an easy-to-read gauge.
